author: duncf
msg: Got rid of terse_report and everything terse_report related.
Got rid of _TERSE_ and moved _SUMMARYT_ to _REPORT_ and _SUMMARRY_
Basically, users should use the _REPORT_ tag in a header to display a
Fixed folding of headers for headers with a \n in them.

author: jmason
msg: bug 1659: support address in report revisited.   Now uses the 'hostname' idea as discussed; report includes scanning hostname, and the default contact address is 'the administrator of that machine' (sic).
